statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE session_id = 123 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY device_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT activity_type, event_details FROM user_activity WHERE device_type = 'mobile' AND activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, event_details -> 'event_name' AS event_name FROM user_activity WHERE session_id = 456 ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, device_type FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND device_type IN ('desktop', 'mobile') ORDER BY activity_timestamp;
SELECT user_id, device_type, jsonb_pretty(event_details) FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'purchase' AND device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY activity_timestamp LIMIT 10;
SELECT count(*) AS total_visits, device_type, session_id FROM user_activity GROUP BY device_type, session_id HAVING total_visits > 5 ORDER BY total_visits DESC;

SELECT user_id, device_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'logout' AND activity_timestamp BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01' AND TIMESTAMP '2022-06-30' ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT activity_date, activity_description FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT username, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity JOIN users ON user_activity.user_id = users.user_id WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email, activity_description FROM users LEFT JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE user_activity.user_id IS NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, app_version FROM performance ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM activities WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT user_id, app_version, MAX(response_time) AS max_response_time FROM performance GROUP BY user_id

SELECT u.username, a.activity_type, p.response_time FROM users u JOIN activities a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN performance p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.response_time > 100 ORDER BY p.response_time ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT activity_type, timestamp FROM activities WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_activities FROM activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5;
SELECT username, action, duration_ms FROM users JOIN performance_logs ON users.user_id = performance_logs.user_id WHERE duration_ms > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT username, action_taken FROM user_activity WHERE user_id=5;
SELECT page_url, timestamp FROM page_view ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interaction WHERE timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT session_id, session_start, session_end FROM user_session WHERE user_id=3;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT action_taken, username FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, action_taken, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 10;

SELECT u.username, p.page_url, u.timestamp AS user_timestamp, p.timestamp AS page_timestamp FROM user_activity u JOIN page_view p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY u.timestamp DESC;
